CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vectrus, Inc. is registered with the U.S. Security and Exchange Commission and incorporated in the state of Indiana. Vectrus, Inc is primarely in the business of services-facilities support management services. For financial reporting, their fiscal year ends on December 31st. This page includes all SEC registration details as well as a list of all documents (S-1, Prospectus, Current Reports, 8-K, 10K, Annual Reports) filed by Vectrus, Inc.. Vectrus Inc is a U.S.-based company that provides services to the U.S. government. It operates as one segment and offer facility and logistics services and information technology and network communications services. The information technology and network communications capabilities consist of communications systems operations and maintenance, management and service support, systems installation and activation, system-of-systems engineering and software development, and mission support for the department of defense.
